edu.bonn.cs.iv.bonnmotion

类 Topology

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.bonn.cs.iv.bonnmotion.Topology

  • public class Topology
extends java.lang.Object
    A Topology object stores a set of Positions and offers methods to create adjacencies based on fixed or variable transmission ranges.

                                  double maxTxRange,
                                  boolean strangeMode)
        Cone-based, optimised.
        参数:
        strangeMode - if set to true, add neighbour only if we don't already have a neighbour with angle alpha/2
